For some reasons we are now getting setFocus on a ViewPart before 
createPartControl has been called. This is a change in the calling sequence 
which affects other views as well (I saw the same in the package explorer).

Moving to Platfrom/UI since they call setFocus before createPartControl has 
been called which wasn't the case in I20040506. 

Marking as major since it affects every view.
*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of 61842 ***
